name: Chocolate Log
ingredients: 1/4 tsp cream of tartar 1/4 cup + 1 Tbsp sifted flour
steps: Separate eggs. Beat whites with cream of tartar until stiff. Beat yolk and add vanilla and water. Sift dry ingredients
one more time...together this time. Add yolk mixture to dry. Fold in egg whites. Grease jelly roll pan by
putting shortening then wax paper and then shortening again. Bake in a jelly roll pan at 375 for 15 minutes.
Put a clean towel on a counter and plaster powdered sugar on the towel. Turn over cake onto towel.
Roll up cake loosely inside of towel. Unroll when cooled. Spread with 1/2 pint sweetened whipped
whipping cream and a couple hand fulls of miniature marshmallows... and crushed peppermint candy if desired.
Mix all ingredients. Frost and top with nuts, cherries, gum drops, etc.
